# EnumFormatter constructor

EnumFormatter constructor which defines how to serialize an enumerated value.

```csharp
public EnumFormatter(Type enumType, EnumOptions options = EnumOptions.String)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| enumType | The type definition of the enumeration |
| options | Controls whether to write out the enumeration as its string or integer equivalent. |
